decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Drawings titled ' Parasols location plan', 'Parasols block plan', 'Parasols proposed elevation CLP and Middle Yard', 'Parasols proposed elevation Provender Store', 'Parasols proposed elevation Long Stable', 'Parasols proposed elevation North Yard', 'Parasols existing layout' all dated 17/12/2019, 'Parasols proposed layout' dated 23/01/2020, and design document received 23/01/2020. 

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Installation of freestanding parasols within the Stables Market and Camden Lock Market.
ward: Camden Town with Primrose Hill (Pre May 2022)
